entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as a teenager who had plastered the walls with posters and pictures. His parents are mentioned to have been unable to remove the Permanent Sticking Charm that kept them on the wall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is observing Sirius's decorations and making assumptions about his parents.

entities.name: sirius's parents
entities.description: Sirius's parents are mentioned to have been unable to remove the Permanent Sticking Charm that kept the posters on the wall.

entities.name: gryffindor banners
entities.description: Several large Gryﬃndor banners were plastered on the walls by Sirius.

relationships.description: Sirius had plastered several large Gryﬃndor banners on the walls.
Harry was observing Sirius's decorations and making assumptions about his parents.
